block.title: PagerDuty Resolve Keyword
block.text: To allow Splunk to resolve PagerDuty incidents, we use a keyword in the alert name to specify that a specific alert will send a resolve event instead of a trigger event. Below you can set the keyword you wish to use.
Ex: Keyword = resolver, Alert Trigger Name = Ping Test, Alert Resolver Name = Ping Test resolver

block.title: PagerDuty Resolve Keyword Location
block.text: By default the Resolve Keyword should be the last word of your alert name. If you wish to put it in the front, click the checkbox below.

input.label: Move Keyword To Front Of Alert Name
